The user interface uses the Android Developer Icons from https://github.com/opoloo/androidicons, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International CC BY-SA 4.0 license.

Loading animation by 杜磊 on LottieFiles licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 (BY) license.
In order to send scanned barcodes to Picard you have to connect your device to the same network as the computer running Picard. Enter the IP address of the computer and Picard\'s port number below.
Could not connect to Picard. Please check the connection settings and your Wi-Fi connection.
Use your device\'s camera to scan the barcode of a CD or other music media. If MusicBrainz knows about the media it will automatically be loaded into MusicBrainz Picard.
MusicBrainz has found the following results for the barcode %1$s and sent them to Picard:
MusicBrainz has not found any release for the barcode %1$s.
